title: Teemo Support.
body:
What the heck is up with people constantly bagging out teemo support and getting aggressivly toxic every time i go teemo support with a friend or even when not with a friend. I usually win the lane for my ADC, stop jungle ganks from level 6 on. Keep the ADC from trading with my ADC and help win trades easily 95% of the time i play teemo supp. 

The only argument i see as kind of valid is he does steal a lot of kills if the ADC doesn't know how to save abilities to last hit. 

Other than that his an amazing support who can stop all damage from jungler or adc if they focus a target! His also good at keeping supp and ADC out of lane as his dots and damage hurt a lot after first item. Plus i get a Frost queen or all teemos should who supp and it slows for the team and gives vision!!! 

I just don't understand all the hate can you guys please explain why you hate it??

replies.body:
Hey!

Don't worry about some of the haters on here :) I used to main Teemo support myself back in the day. 

I think people just hate it because it's Teemo. Next time you're in-game though, try explaing the following:

+ It's actually a very viable pick against teams with auto-attack based ADC's (**Vayne**, **Twitch**, **Tristana**,** Kog'Maw**.. etc.)

+ It's also very good against team with an auto-attack heavy top, such as **Tryndamere** or **Aatrox**.

+ It's also very very good against quishy Devourer junglers, such as **Master Yi** and AD **Fizz**.

Here's some things to think about though:

+ He doesn't work well with ADC's who will need hard CC peel (e.g Against assasins and super tanks).

+ He doesn't work well against super tanky top laners who don't care about the blind much (e.g **Nasus **and **Sion**).

Make sure you play what you enjoy though! 
I think the fact that he counters Kog and Yi is enough to play him in the current meta :D

Actually i don't believe your cons about him. His got amazing peel. His Q stops their attacks. You can build him tanky so he can take poke for his ADC. His shrooms have one of the biggest slows and ranges in the game for a trap item. Actually they have the BIGGEST range for a trap ability. 

He does do well against tanks, as most the time if your team is AD heavy they wont build for AP and you will shread them with a proper AP item build.  Plus you are hardly focused in team fights meaning you can throw up to at least 3 shrooms and AA around 40 times or more spreading your aids like poison around their team from both your E and your R. 

Nasus also feels the blind more than any other. His Q can and will miss on your blind and will also activate it making it also miss and go on CD. Sion is even easier against teemo, the only downside is sions passive which is insane if you dont save your W and blind for it.


ALSO you will probably be focused early game when bot as the enemy ADC will HATE YOU. So if you have a strong ADC with you. Like Lucian, MF or any other strong hitting early ADC they can do their work while they both focus on you, and net him or her early kills.
boy you see one of these running after ya, you dead {{champion:19}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:64}}

I agree with what Telecasterdude wrote. Very objective. Teemo could be a niche support, but he's not an all purpose support. E.g. against Morgana he can only provide mushrooms for the black bean sauce.

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=igzE6AjE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-18T15:02:49.274+0000)
>
> Actually i don't believe your cons about him. His got amazing peel. His Q stops their attacks. You can build him tanky so he can take poke for his ADC. His shrooms have one of the biggest slows and ranges in the game for a trap item. Actually they have the BIGGEST range for a trap ability. 

Yeah he can do 1 Q in a team fight, then he is mashed like a potato. I thought you said you build him AP, not tank? As for his traps, the majority of the opposition team will get oracle's lenses to take mushrooms to the sunday market.

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=igzE6AjE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-18T15:02:49.274+0000)
>
> He does do well against tanks, as most the time if your team is AD heavy they wont build for AP and you will shread them with a proper AP item build.  Plus you are hardly focused in team fights meaning you can throw up to at least 3 shrooms and AA around 40 times or more spreading your aids like poison around their team from both your E and your R. 

This is like any AP Mage support that bronzers don't itemise for. But you won't have the gold to go full AP as a support. Well, maybe you will at bronze level, anything's possible there.

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=igzE6AjE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-18T15:02:49.274+0000)
>
> Nasus also feels the blind more than any other. His Q can and will miss on your blind and will also activate it making it also miss and go on CD. Sion is even easier against teemo, the only downside is sions passive which is insane if you dont save your W and blind for it.

And someone like a Nautilus or Trundle would do different things to Teemo.

> 
> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=igzE6AjE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-02-18T15:02:49.274+0000)
> 
> ALSO you will probably be focused early game when bot as the enemy ADC will HATE YOU. So if you have a strong ADC with you. Like Lucian, MF or any other strong hitting early ADC they can do their work while they both focus on you, and net him or her early kills.

Yes you definitely will be focused early, by the enemy **jungler**, as all mage supports are. Before 6 you won't be able to stop a good Lee Sin gank. His kit is just too selfish, to be considered a real alternative for other supports, in higher elo play.

i don't care what role teemo is in...
teemo must die
LOL

Jking
as long as u can win the game, don't worry about what other's say
some people are too constrained by the standard formation, as in who should do what
i was playing with AD Soraka once (still supporting at the same time tho
and people freak the fk out lol
but during that match i did more dmg over all then the jger who started calling me noob
and me and my ADC had most kill over all, ofcoz we won the game
so yah, good fun slap faces some time
not saying AD Soraka is a good build to play with
but it sure is a interesting change to the standard formation
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Personally, I would like to see a Teemo stop get Darius off of his adc. Or a Maokai. Or hell, ANYONE with anything more than just auto attacks
Hey now its been 9 days since you asked me to prove you wrong, what happened to your counter argument to all the statements I made? Did you realiase that you were wrong so you just left?

Because hes a shit support, simple as that. Simply cause you use him to win the lane does not make him a good one. While yes he has things that help your adc (a blind, slows from the shrooms) once a team fight starts Teemo is nothing more then dead weight. He can't peel like Janna or stun lock the enemy team like Leona. Its like saying Nidalee is a good support cause she won the lane. Once team fights start you bring nothing to it.

So blinds stop working in a team fight. I never knew that. Some mechanic ive never seen? What about his shrooms do they do nothing too in team fight?? I didnt know this new mechanic was in the game where teemo cant do anything once in a team fight. 

Like does his Auto attack just stop working too? 

Sure he has no stuns but his blind is basiclly a stun for any AA using champion. If i see a luci on the enemy team or a yi i know every team fight who will be blind. And i do that, keeping a yi blind means no DPS for their team, as he becomes the sole source of DMG for most teams as he takes the gold lead. A weak yi means team fight wins.

Also have you ever chased a team in a fight and been slowed and lose over 500 hp for every team member because of a shroom. Only to hit another shroom? His shrooms if used right can win you so many fights it isn't even funny. Leona may have an amazing stun lock potential but once she uses her abilities she is just a damage soak and if your team is anywhere near awake or good they won't even touch her till the end of a fight. 

Also when does winning the lane not help the team? He doesn't only win you the lane he can win you the jungle too, cant counter a jungle if you keep hitting shrooms and getting spotted. Or what about the jungler trying to jungle and hits shrooms i cant tell you how many junglers ive made afk because of this. Also good teemo's will shroom mid for mid laner and get him easy counter ganks or escape. 

You only state how bad his team fight is but you never explain how or why his bad in team fight. He can still use all his abilities and they ALL do something important for a team fight. Not only that his damage is insane even as a support. His auto plus poison can hit for 300+ with half build =/ hit everyone in the fight who is available and keep cycling you can deal insane damage and throw a shroom and blind or two. You won the team fight just with that.

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=igzE6AjE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-14T17:49:39.857+0000)
>
> So blinds stop working in a team fight. I never knew that. Some mechanic ive never seen? What about his shrooms do they do nothing too in team fight?? I didnt know this new mechanic was in the game where teemo cant do anything once in a team fight.

> Sure he has no stuns but his blind is basiclly a stun for any AA using champion. If i see a luci on the enemy team or a yi i know every team fight who will be blind. And i do that, keeping a yi blind means no DPS for their team, as he becomes the sole source of DMG for most teams as he takes the gold lead. A weak yi means team fight wins.

His shrooms if used right can win you so many fights it isn't even funny. Leona may have an amazing stun lock potential but once she uses her abilities she is just a damage soak and if your team is anywhere near awake or good they won't even touch her till the end of a fight.

Or what about the jungler trying to jungle and hits shrooms i cant tell you how many junglers ive made afk because of this. Also good teemo's will shroom mid for mid laner and get him easy counter ganks or escape. 
> 
> You only state how bad his team fight is but you never explain how or why his bad in team fight. He can still use all his abilities and they ALL do something important for a team fight. Not only that his damage is insane even as a support. His auto plus poison can hit for 300+ with half build =/ hit everyone in the fight who is available and keep cycling you can deal insane damage and throw a shroom and blind or two. You won the team fight just with that.

Ok so dealing with a bronzy, so ill spell it out for you.  Ready? Here is the super secret reason Teemo sucks as a support.


He has 0 peel, no sustain and no way to lock down the enemy. Lets use Leona, Braum and Soraka as our standard support and compare them to teemo.


Leona has the ability to lock down a whole team ( but much more likely 2-3 people), has relatively high damage at low levels on low Cd, her W gives her free tank stats and her E lets her get to the back line with relative ease and her passive means that each time at opponent is hit after an ability is used on them they take extra damage. For simplicity sake lets say its flat 100 true damage at all levels. That means shes dealing at least 300 extra damage to 4 opponents if she got them in a full spell rotation  as he Q is a single stun.

Braum's passive means that as long as he can land an AA or Q his team can get a stun off, while not as reliable as Leona for stuns its still nice to have. His W is free tanks stats for him and an ally and his E makes the First projectile used against it useless and everything after that dealing only 1/2 damage to him alone, effectively shutting down an adc and  most  AP casters . His Ult Is also great for either engage or disengage depending on what you need it for.

While my knowledge on Soraka is less then Braum and Leona as i prefer tanks I still know enough about her for this. Her passive lets he get to allies with a 70% ms boost when they are below 40% hp and her passive also lets her cast all her abilities, despite having a cast time without interrupting her moment. Her Q is an amazing Heal that almost requires you to take ignite if your in a lane against her and her W is a AOE silence that shuts down AP casters, assassin and adc's like Lucian who rely on spells to do most of their damage and her ult is a team heal.

Now that we have the standard supports out of the way lets look at teemo.
Teemos attack range is 500, that puts him on the same AA range as Lucian, kog and sivir. His Q is only 580 meaning that if the opponet is playing a support like Leona or an adc like Ashe or Cait you have to expose your self. At max rank his Q has a 2.5 sec blind duration and is on a 8 second cool down but unlike Quinns blind you can still see, only your AA don't hit your vision is not reduced. His E does give him but if your not laning against a Lucian, Sivir( who can spell shield blinding dart) or Kog with Bio arcane down then your not getting any damage for free and ill most likely come out negative. As for his Ult it does good damage to squishy targets and have a decent slow however they take 1 second to prime so its no guaranteed it will even pop as that's more then enough time to move away from it, especially if they are playing a high mobility ADC. He also doesn't really bring that much if he or the team is behind as he is Item dependent for his damage and his Q only works on one person so what do you do if the enemy has a Zed and a Yi. 

Is that enough for you?

Is that enough for you?

You'll get more hate especially if you don't build vision.
BTW, do u build IBG on him, or u go full AP?

Usually full AP.

But if we need tank ill build full tank.

AP build - Frost Queen> Ionia boots> Nashor/Morello >Luden > Lisandry then any other item. Most the time i get Crystal scept for my last item for the tank and slow for my Q. 

Tank i go - Frost Queen > Ninja/Merc > Randu > Crystal > Lisandry >warmong(i think its warmong, its been a while) or thronmail.

Hey,

Dont listen to the others.

I think he is a very good support and just like Riot, encourage everyone to try something different they think is fun. After all. This is a video game. The main purpose is to be fun.

~Reported4Verbal~ OCE~  Always Happy To Help! :)
ARAM Main! In SR, 
Main Support {{champion:37}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:8}} 
Fill Except Top & Jungle

Lol yeah. My fav supps are Thresh, teemo, brand, annie, Leona. I have a high win rate with all of those as support and i kind of get annoyed when most people look down on all those champs as support. Of course Leona and Thresh get the love. I just mean more Teemo, Annie and brand.

Q - Auto attack cancel
W - Gotta go fast
E - Poke
R - Kill me now.
teemo support is good, im like hey teemo go stand in that bush for the rest of the game we need a ward there.
you're asking us why people dont like teemo support? i have absolutely no idea, hmmm.....
